description: Dominant language, and language family, spoken across Namibia. Based largely on information collected during the 1991 Population and Housing Census conducted by the Central Statistics Office. Each enumeration area was assigned based on the language spoken by the majority of people within it (Mendelsohn J, Jarvis A, Roberts C and Robertson T. 2002. Atlas of Namibia: A portrait of the land and its people. David Philip Publishers, Cape Town, South Africa).
name: Namibia: Distribution of language groups
